title: PLURAL+ 2015 Youth Video Festival and Awards Ceremony
desc: PLURAL+ 2015 Youth Video Festival and Awards Ceremony December 3rd, 2015 The Paley Center for Media? 25 W 52nd St, New York, NY 10019 A joint initiative between the United Nations Alliance of Civilizations (UNAOC) and the International Organization for Migration (IOM), with the support of many international partners,?PLURAL+ is a video competition and festival celebrating youth-produced videos on the issues of migration, diversity and social inclusion.? ? ? The detail program of the PLURAL+ 2015 Awards will be released soon.? For more information, please visit? pluralplus.unaoc.org ? ?? Follow US
